author: Allison H
text: “didn’t affect you.” This affects everyone, regardless of race, religion, socioeconomic situation. This is something that is as a collective humanity must remember and teach to our children and future generations. @HolocaustMuseum #HolocaustRemembrance

author: Allison H
text: from WWII And the Holocaust, it is even more important to keep sharing the history of these horrific crimes so they can be prevented and learned from. Today is the 77th anniversary of the liberation of Auschwitz. Please don’t ignore this because it uncomfortable or it

author: Allison H
text: Today in 1945, the world truly learned of the atrocities inflicted by the Nazis. Unfortunately, regardless of the overwhelming evidence at our fingertips, there are still people that don’t believe it happened or what the true scale this horrific act was. As we get further away https://t.co/fKJTbRNC6G

author: Allison H
text: Especially when it comes to racism, sexism, xenophobia. But they should not shy away from subjects simply because they’re uncomfortable to talk or learn about. That’s how we learn and grow.

author: Allison H
text:
ruled by the deceased crime lord Jabba the Hutt.                                 My aunt looks to my mom: Did you understand any words she just said?
My mom: Not really.                       Me: I told you I have no idea what to expect.

author: Allison H
text: My aunt: 😐                                         I read the show mini description: The legendary bounty hunter Boba Fett navigates the underworld of the galaxy with mercenary Fennec Shand when they return to the sands of Tattooine to stake their claim on the territory formerly

author: Allison H
text: Me explaining #BobaFett to my aunt: “Yeah he’s a former bounty hunter, who may be a good guy or a bad guy. It’s his story about how he survives being earthen be a sand monster in The Mandalorian. And maybe is adultnapped by the Tusken. I’m not really sure what to expect. No clue.

author: Allison H
text: My grievance for #Festivus is that for some ridiculous reason, dental and vision are separate health insurance policies, even though - as far as I can recall - my eyes and teeth are INSIDE & part of my body.

text: They just left their son in jail (where he belongs), seemingly unconcerned for him. Their lack of care for others is alarming.
